#nametype [nametype]: 146
The Bogatyrs are heroic knights and defenders of the faith. They emerge in times of need to defend cities and villages from the wicked and the foul. Blessed with superhuman might and prowess, it is quite possible that they have Chud and Van blood in their veins.
